name: Vegefrice (Lando)
description:
To ensure that your lands are always fertile and plenty of food, a divine hand is always welcome. You just need to do one thing - deliver some animal to be sacrificed.

An easy job if you weren’t vegan, right? Let’s say that animal sacrifice is not too much your vibe.

So… Will you be capable to cheat a God?! Show that you have mastery!

Use your plantations to create animal replicas at the altar in the right time for the sacrifice or the angry of the god will fall on your head.

👩🏻‍💻 Code
Orlando Batista
André Mariano

🎨 2D Art
Wellington Fattori

📃 Writer
